docs.snippet: After initially denying that he had bitten Italy’s Giorgio Chiellini, Luis Suárez of Uruguay admitted he had and apologized via Twitter on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: After initially denying that he had bitten Italy’s Giorgio Chiellini, Luis Suárez of Uruguay admitted he had and apologized via Twitter on Monday.
docs.abstract: World Cup Roundup; Uruguay striker Luis Suarez issues public apology for biting Italy's Giorgio Chiellini in group stage match, his third on-field biting incident since 2010, and pledges that there will 'never again' be a similar incident; other tournament news noted.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Luis Suárez Apologizes for Biting Giorgio Chiellini
headline.main: Striker Vows His Biting Days Are Over
headline.print_headline: Suárez Says Biting Days Are No More
